name: Leaves started in previous month
query:
SELECT 
    UPPER(employee_name) as "EMPLOYEE:Data:300",
    UPPER(department) as "DEPARTMENT:Data:300",
    CASE 
        WHEN leave_type IN ('Annual Leave - JD', 'Annual Leave - SD') THEN 'ANNUAL LEAVE'
        ELSE UPPER(leave_type)
    END as "LEAVE TYPE:Data:150",
    CONCAT(
        RIGHT(CONCAT('00', DAY(from_date)), 2),
        '-',
        RIGHT(CONCAT('00', MONTH(from_date)), 2),
        '-',
        YEAR(from_date)
    ) as "LEAVE START DATE:Data:120",
    CONCAT(
        RIGHT(CONCAT('00', DAY(to_date)), 2),
        '-',
        RIGHT(CONCAT('00', MONTH(to_date)), 2),
        '-',
        YEAR(to_date)
    ) as "LEAVE END DATE:Data:120",
    total_leave_days as "TOTAL LEAVE DAYS:Int:20"
FROM 
    `tabLeave Application`
WHERE 
    workflow_state = 'Leave APPROVED'
    AND MONTH(from_date) = MONTH(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
    AND YEAR(from_date) = YEAR(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH))
ORDER BY from_date;
